summary: Completed comprehensive testing of StarNews India news portal. Frontend UI/UX is excellent and fully functional, but all backend API endpoints are returning 404 errors, preventing authentication and data operations.

critical_bugs.issue: All API routes return 404 Not Found errors
critical_bugs.impact: Complete backend functionality failure - no authentication, no data loading, no CRUD operations

critical_bugs.issue: Admin login fails with 'Request failed' error
critical_bugs.impact: Admin cannot access dashboard - blocks all admin functionality

critical_bugs.issue: Reporter login fails with 'Login failed' error
critical_bugs.impact: Reporters cannot access dashboard - blocks news submission

critical_bugs.issue: Seed endpoints return 404 - admin/reporter accounts may not be initialized
critical_bugs.impact: Database may not be seeded with required admin and reporter accounts

backend_issues.root_cause_analysis: Next.js catch-all API route [[...path]]/route.js appears to not be functioning. Possible causes: 1) MongoDB connection failure, 2) API route configuration issues, 3) Environment variable problems, 4) Database not accessible

integration_issues.issue: Shows 'No Politics/City News articles available' and 'No Business news available'
integration_issues.cause: API endpoints not returning data due to backend 404 errors

integration_issues.issue: Login forms submit but fail due to API errors
integration_issues.cause: Backend API authentication endpoints not accessible

design_issues.issue: Live TV link not found in navigation menu

action_item_for_main_agent.priority_3: Run seed endpoints to initialize admin (Riyaz@StarNews) and reporter (aman@reporterStarNews) accounts
